response.original_title: Blacksmith Rose - “They Don’t Make ‘Em Like Willie Anymore”
response.overview: “They Don’t Make ‘Em Like Willie Anymore” is a musial “love letter” of appreciation for Texas singer-songwriter Willie Nelson’s music. At first glance you might think this is a music video, and you would be correct. But it’s also a succinct, multifaceted, video documentary because it’s about Willie’s music, the important role it’s played it people’s lives, and also shows how his influence has inspired visual artists throughout Texas who have created works of art that feature his image.
response.title: Blacksmith Rose - “They Don’t Make ‘Em Like Willie Anymore”
